## About This Course

This course focuses on improving communication skills, grammar accuracy, and confidence in real-life English usage.

## Course Criteria
- **Level**: Intermediate
- **Duration**: 12 weeks
- **Class Schedule**: Mondays to Fridays, 5:30 PM - 7:00 PM
- **Assessment**: Weekly quizzes, mid-term exam, final exam

**Score Breakdown:**

| Component                         | Weight (%) |
|----------------------------------|------------|
| Attendance (AT)                  | 10         |
| Class Participation (CP)         | 5          |
| Presentation / Assessment (P/A)  | 10         |
| Quiz (Q) + Homework (HW)         | 15         |
| Midterm Exam (ME)                | 15         |
| Final Exam (FE)                  | 15         |
| **Foreigner Teacher Score Record** (FTSR) | 30   |

<span style="color:red; font-weight:600;">
**Note**: A minimum overall score of 60% is required to pass the course.
</span>
